titles.title: To extend nondiscriminatory treatment to the products of Romania for 3 years.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E779)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1787-1788)

bill.summary: 3/25/1993--Introduced. Extends nondiscriminatory treatment (most-favored-nation treatment) to the products of Romania for a three-year period. Subjects such treatment to there being in effect a bilateral commercial agreement between Romania and the United States.
